text: A Night in Casablanca is a 1946 American comedy movie directed by Archie Mayo and starring Groucho Marx, Harpo Marx, Chico Marx, Charles Drake, Lois Collier, Sig Ruman, Lewis L. Russell. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Archie Mayo
title: A Night in Casablanca
